alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:58PM EDT until June 14 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adamstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reamstown, Adamstown, Bowmansville, Reinholds and Fivepointville. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 284 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
